TABLE.NAME: mgroup
TABLE.COMMENT: Table containing instances of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course that each instance belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The full name of each instance of the module.

FIELD.NAME: groupsize
FIELD.COMMENT: The group size of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: datasource
FIELD.COMMENT: The datasource of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: mbfi
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of an instance of the mbfi module of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: enrolled
FIELD.COMMENT: The enrolled student value of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: numberofcharacteristics
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of characteristics of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: populationsize
FIELD.COMMENT: The population size of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: selectionoperator
FIELD.COMMENT: The selection operator of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: mutationoperator
FIELD.COMMENT: The mutation operator of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: numberofgenerations
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of generations of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: groupingtype
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of generations of each module mgroup.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Text format of intro field

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Module mgroup creation time.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Module mgroup modified time.

TABLE.NAME: mgroup_individuals
TABLE.COMMENT: Individuals participating in a collaborative workgroup.

FIELD.NAME: mgroupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the mgroup that each instance belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: workgroup
FIELD.COMMENT: The collaborative workgroup of each individual.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of each user.

FIELD.NAME: username
FIELD.COMMENT: The username of each user.

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: The fullname of each user.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Individual creation time.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Individual modified time.
